subject: Questions about Simsonn Plus X Pedals
description_text: Hello,      I would like to order the Simsonn Plus X Pedals from your website to my country Jordan. I would like to ask a few questions:       Is it possible to ship to Amman, Jordan?    How can I specify to use DHL Express for the logistics carrier (as DHL acts as broker and handles customs declaration in my country)?    Also will the baseplate be able to be mounted on a PXN-A10 wheel stand?       Thank you.

conversations.body_text: ID 为 10270 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单10270  
      主题: Questions about Simsonn Plus X Pedals  
      描述:  
Hello,  
 
 
 
 
I would like to order the Simsonn Plus X Pedals from your website to my country Jordan. I would like to ask a few questions: 
 
 
 
 
 
 Is it possible to ship to Amman, Jordan? 
 
 
 How can I specify to use DHL Express for the logistics carrier (as DHL acts as broker and handles customs declaration in my country)? 
 
 
 Also will the baseplate be able to be mounted on a PXN-A10 wheel stand? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Thank you.
